titles.title: Remuneration for Ecological and Societal Tolls Occasioned by Reckless Errors Act
RESTORE Act
A bill to amend title 46, United States Code, to repeal certain limitations of liability and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 6/10/2010--Introduced. Remuneration for Ecological and Societal Tolls Occasioned by Reckless Errors Act or RESTORE Act - Repeals specified general limitations on liability (the Limitation of Liability Act) for personal injury or death, or loss or damage to merchandise due to fire, on seagoing vessels.
